title: IStructuralMemberFeatureData.WeldmentProfilePath
description: Gets or sets the path for the profile for this structural member.
returns: Full path and filename for the profile (see Remarks )
remarks:
Weldment profiles are located in
install_dir
/lang/
lang
/weldment profiles
subfolders and are named
filename
.sldflp
.
See
Accessing Selections that Define Features
for additional details.
